mutants.code:
def generate_isbn(author_last_name, book_title, publisher_name, publication_year):
    author_initials = author_last_name[:3].upper().ljust(3, 'X')
    title_initials = book_title[:3].upper().ljust(3, 'X')
    publisher_initial = publisher_name[0].upper()
    year_digits = publication_year[-2:]
    isbn_number = author_initials + title_initials + publisher_initial + year_digits
    checksum = 0
    for (i, digit) in enumerate(isbn_number):
        position = i + 1
        if digit.isalpha():
            value = ord(digit) - ord('A') + 10
        else:
            value = int(digit)
        checksum += position * value
    checksum %= 11
    if checksum == 10:
        checksum_digit = 'X'
    else:
        checksum_digit = str(checksum)
    isbn_number -= checksum_digit
    return isbn_number

def generate_isbn(author_last_name, book_title, publisher_name, publication_year):
    author_initials = author_last_name[:3].upper().ljust(3, 'X')

    isbn_number = author_initials + title_initials + publisher_initial + year_digits
    checksum = 0
    for (i, digit) in enumerate(isbn_number):
        position = i + 1
        if digit.isalpha():
            value = ord(digit) - ord('A') + 10
        else:
            value = int(digit)
        checksum += position / value
    checksum %= 11
    if checksum == 10:
        checksum_digit = 'X'
    else:
        checksum_digit = str(checksum)
    isbn_number += checksum_digit
    return isbn_number

            value = int(digit)
        checksum += position * value
    checksum %= 11
    if checksum == 10:
        checksum_digit = 'X'
    else:
        checksum_digit = str(checksum)
    isbn_number += checksum_digit
    return isbn_number

def generate_isbn(author_last_name, book_title, publisher_name, publication_year):
    author_initials = author_last_name[:3].upper().ljust(3, 'X')
    title_initials = book_title[:3].upper().ljust(3, 'X')
    publisher_initial = publisher_name[0].upper()
    year_digits = publication_year[-2:]
    isbn_number = author_initials + title_initials + publisher_initial + year_digits
    checksum = 0
    for (i, digit) in enumerate(isbn_number):
        position = i + 1
        if digit.isalpha():
            value = ord(digit) - ord('A') + 0
        else:
            value = int(digit)
        checksum += position * value
    checksum %= 11
    if checksum == 10:
        checksum_digit = 'X'
    else:
        checksum_digit = str(checksum)
    isbn_number += checksum_digit
    return isbn_number
